info.name: Fleet Management API v2
info.description:
Complete API collection for Fleet Management System with 50K+ vehicle support.

## Base URL
**Production**: `https://indusjs-fleet-docker-960880113496.asia-south2.run.app/api/v2`
**Local**: `http://localhost:8080/api/v2`

## API Versioning (Hybrid)
- **URL Path**: `/api/v2/...` (primary)
- **Header**: `X-API-Version: v2`
- **Query**: `?api_version=v2`

## Supported Versions
- **v1**: Legacy (backward compatible)
- **v2**: Current (recommended)

## Date & Time Formats (IMPORTANT)
- **Date**: `DD-MM-YYYY` format ONLY (e.g., 31-12-2025, 01-01-2024)
- **Time**: `HH:MM` 24-hour format (e.g., 14:30, 09:00)
- **Note**: All date fields must use DD-MM-YYYY format. ISO 8601 format is NOT accepted for date fields.

## Trip Response - State-Based Display Info
Trip APIs return `display_info` object with state-appropriate fields:

**Planned State**: estimated_distance, cargo_type, cost_summary. Distance/Duration = 'NA'
**In Progress State**: covered_distance, duration, total_distance, cargo_type, cost_summary, progress_info
**Completed State**: total_distance, duration, cargo_type, cost_summary

Key fields: `display_value` (primary UI value), `display_label` (context label), values show 'NA' when unavailable.

## Tech Stack
- Go 1.21+ with Gin Framework
- PostgreSQL 14+ with GORM
- JWT Authentication
- MQTT (EMQX) for GPS
- WebSocket for real-time

## User Roles
- **Owner**: Full access
- **Manager**: Operational access
- **Supervisor**: View & track only

## Rate Limits
- Standard: 100 req/min
- Location: 1000 req/min
- Auth: 10 req/min

variable.description: All dates must be in DD-MM-YYYY format (e.g., 31-12-2025)
All times must be in 24-hour HH:MM format (e.g., 14:30)

item.name: 00. API Info & Versioning
item.description: API information and versioning endpoints (no auth required)

item.name: 01. Authentication
item.description: Public authentication endpoints

item.name: 02. Profile
item.description: User profile management

item.name: 03. Team Management
item.description: Owner only - Manage managers and supervisors

item.name: 04. Drivers
item.description: Driver management

item.name: 05. Vehicles
item.description: Vehicle management

item.name: Update Vehicle
item.description:
Update a vehicle. All fields are optional.

**Supported Fields:**
- `make`: Vehicle manufacturer
- `model`: Vehicle model
- `year`: Manufacturing year
- `vehicle_type`: Type of vehicle (car, truck, etc.)
- `fuel_type`: Fuel type (diesel, petrol, electric, cng)
- `capacity`: Cargo capacity
- `color`: Vehicle color
- `mileage`: Fuel efficiency (km per liter or km per charge)
- `assigned_driver_id`: ID of the assigned driver (optional, can be null)

**Response includes:**
- `mileage`: Vehicle mileage
- `assigned_driver_id`: Assigned driver ID
- `assigned_driver`: Full driver object if assigned

item.name: Get Vehicle Overview
item.description: Get vehicle overview for detail screen including basic info, current status, and summary statistics.

item.name: Get Vehicle Trips
item.description: Get all trips for a specific vehicle with pagination.

item.name: Get Vehicle Route
item.description: Get current route information for a vehicle including active trip route.

item.name: Get Vehicle Detail Full
item.description: Get comprehensive vehicle detail including overview, recent trips, documents summary, and maintenance status.

item.name: Get Vehicle Documents Detail
item.description: Get detailed document information for a vehicle including expiry alerts.

item.name: Upload Vehicle Document
item.description: Upload a document for a vehicle.

item.name: Bulk Upload Vehicle Documents
item.description: Bulk upload multiple documents for a vehicle.

item.name: Register Vehicle with Documents
item.description: Register a new vehicle with documents in a single request.

item.name: 06. Documents
item.description: Vehicle document management

item.name: Get Documents by Status
item.description: Get documents by status. Valid statuses: pending, verified, rejected, expired.

item.name: Download Document
item.description: Download the actual document file.

item.name: Verify Document
item.description: Verify or reject a document. Status can be 'verified' or 'rejected'.

item.name: 07. Trips
item.description: Trip management with pricing and payment

item.name: Create Trip

body.raw:
{
    "vehicle_id": 1,
    "driver_id": 1,
    "scheduled_date": "2026-01-20T00:00:00Z",
    "start_time": "2026-01-20T09:00:00Z",
    "delivery_date": "2026-01-20T00:00:00Z",
    "delivery_time": "2026-01-20T17:00:00Z",
    "planned_start": "2026-01-20T09:00:00Z",
    "planned_end": "2026-01-20T17:00:00Z",
    "start_location": "Warehouse A, Mumbai",
    "start_lat": 19.0760,
    "start_lng": 72.8777,
    "end_location": "Customer Site B, Pune",
    "end_lat": 18.5204,
    "end_lng": 73.8567,
    "estimated_distance": 150.5,
    "cargo_type": "gitti",
    "cargo_description": "Gravel for construction",
    "cargo_loading_weight": 16.5,
    "cargo_unloading_weight": 16.2,
    "vehicle_weight": 8.5,
    "weight_unit": "ft3",
    "fuel_type": "diesel",
    "filled_fuel_quantity": 150.5,
    "used_fuel_quantity": 0,
    "fuel_rate": 89.50,
    "km_per_liter": 4.5,
    "purchase_price": 50000.00,
    "selling_value": 75000.00,
    "estimated_expense": 15000.00,
    "payment_status": "pending",
    "pending_amount": 75000.00,
    "payment_mode": "upi",
    "customer_name": "ABC Construction",
    "customer_contact": "+919876543210",
    "priority": "high"
}

item.description:
Create a new trip.

**Required Fields:**
- `vehicle_id`, `driver_id`: Assignment
- `scheduled_date`, `start_time`: Schedule (ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2026-01-20T09:00:00Z)
- `planned_start`, `planned_end`: Duration calculation (ISO 8601 format) - REQUIRED for duration display
- `start_location`, `start_lat`, `start_lng`: Source location
- `end_location`, `end_lat`, `end_lng`: Destination location
- `cargo_type`: Type of cargo

**Important Fields for Display:**
- `estimated_distance`: Distance in km - REQUIRED for distance display
- `planned_start`, `planned_end`: Used to calculate duration_display

**Date/Time Format:** All date/time fields must be in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2026-01-20T09:00:00Z)

request.description:
List all trips with pagination and filters.

**Response Fields (TripListItem):**

**Raw Distance & Duration (always available):**
- `estimated_distance`: Raw estimated distance in km (e.g., 150.5)
- `estimated_distance_label`: Formatted label (e.g., '150.5 km' or 'NA')
- `estimated_duration_minutes`: Raw planned duration in minutes (e.g., 480)
- `estimated_duration_label`: Formatted label (e.g., '8h' or 'NA')

**State-based Display (changes based on trip state):**
- `distance_display`: State-appropriate distance value
  - Planned: shows estimated_distance_label
  - In Progress: shows covered_distance or estimated_distance
  - Completed: shows actual_distance
- `duration_display`: State-appropriate duration value
  - Planned: shows planned_duration_label (e.g., '8h')
  - In Progress: shows covered/elapsed duration
  - Completed: shows actual duration

**Other Fields:**
- `state_label`: Human-readable state (Planned, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled)
- `cargo_type_label`: Formatted cargo type (e.g., 'Construction Material')
- `total_cost`, `total_cost_label`, `has_costs`: Cost summary
- `vehicle_number`, `driver_name`: Assignment info
- `start_location`, `end_location`: Route endpoints

Get a single trip by ID with full details.

**Response includes display_info object with state-based fields:**

**display_info.distance_info:**
- `estimated_distance`, `estimated_distance_label`
- `covered_distance`, `covered_distance_label` (In Progress)
- `total_distance`, `total_distance_label` (Completed)
- `display_value`, `display_label` (Primary value based on state)

**display_info.duration_info:**
- `planned_duration_minutes`, `planned_duration_label`
- `actual_duration_minutes`, `actual_duration_label`
- `display_value`, `display_label` (Primary value based on state)

**display_info.cargo_info:**
- `cargo_type`, `cargo_type_label`, `cargo_description`
- `loading_weight`, `loading_weight_label`, `weight_unit`

**display_info.cost_info:**
- `has_costs`, `total_cost`, `total_cost_label`, `cost_count`
- `fuel_cost`, `toll_cost`, `other_costs`

**display_info.progress_info (In Progress only):**
- `progress_percent`, `progress_percent_label`
- `remaining_distance`, `remaining_distance_label`
- `estimated_arrival`, `estimated_arrival_label`

**State-based display rules:**
- **Planned**: Distance/Duration = 'NA', shows estimated_distance
- **In Progress**: Shows covered_distance, active duration, progress_info
- **Completed**: Shows total_distance, final duration

item.name: Update Trip

body.raw:
{
    "vehicle_id": 2,
    "driver_id": 2,
    "scheduled_date": "2026-01-15T00:00:00Z",
    "start_time": "2026-01-15T08:00:00Z",
    "delivery_date": "2026-01-15T00:00:00Z",
    "delivery_time": "2026-01-15T18:00:00Z",
    "start_location": "Updated Warehouse A, Mumbai",
    "start_lat": 19.0760,
    "start_lng": 72.8777,
    "end_location": "Updated Customer Site B, Pune",
    "end_lat": 18.5204,
    "end_lng": 73.8567,
    "estimated_distance": 155.5,
    "cargo_type": "construction",
    "cargo_description": "Updated cargo description",
    "cargo_loading_weight": 18.0,
    "customer_name": "Updated Customer Name",
    "customer_contact": "+919876543211",
    "priority": "urgent",
    "notes": "Updated delivery instructions"
}

item.description:
Update a trip (only in 'planned' state). Supports updating:

**Vehicle & Driver:**
- `vehicle_id`: Change to another available vehicle
- `driver_id`: Change to another available driver

**Schedule:**
- `scheduled_date`, `start_time`, `delivery_date`, `delivery_time`
- `planned_start`, `planned_end`

**Location:**
- `start_location`, `start_lat`, `start_lng`
- `end_location`, `end_lat`, `end_lng`

**Cargo:**
- `cargo_type`, `cargo_description`
- `cargo_loading_weight`, `cargo_unloading_weight`

**Customer:**
- `customer_name`, `customer_contact`, `customer_email`, `customer_address`

**Other:**
- `priority`, `notes`, `special_instructions`

**Note:** Vehicle/Driver changes are validated for:
- Ownership (must belong to same owner)
- Availability (active state, not on leave/suspended)
- No conflicting trips (not assigned to other planned/in_progress trips)

request.description:
Update trip progress during an in-progress trip.

**Only for in_progress trips.**

**Request Body:**
- `covered_distance`: Distance covered so far in km (optional)
- `covered_duration_minutes`: Duration covered in minutes (optional)
- `current_lat`: Current latitude (optional)
- `current_lng`: Current longitude (optional)

**Response includes display_info** with updated distance and duration display values.

item.name: Get Trip Stops
item.description: Get all stops for a trip in order.

item.name: Add Trip Stop
item.description: Add a new stop to a trip. stop_order determines the sequence.

item.name: Mark Stop Completed
item.description: Mark a trip stop as completed.

item.name: 08. Trip Costs
item.description:
Trip expense tracking (16 cost types).

**Date Format**: DD-MM-YYYY (e.g., 31-12-2025)
**Time Format**: HH:MM 24-hour (e.g., 14:30)

**Cost Types**: fuel, toll, driver_allowance, parking, loading_charges, unloading_charges, insurance, permit, registration_renewal, fitness_check, emission_test, state_permit, national_permit, chalan, other

**Fuel-specific fields (when cost_type='fuel')**: fuel_type, fuel_quantity, fuel_rate, km_per_liter
**Other cost type (when cost_type='other')**: custom_cost_type_name

item.name: Get Cost Types
item.description: Returns all 16 cost types with category labels (operating, cargo, compliance, penalty, misc).

item.name: Create Trip Cost - Fuel
item.description: Create fuel cost with fuel-specific fields: fuel_type (diesel/petrol/cng), fuel_quantity (liters), fuel_rate (INR/liter), km_per_liter (efficiency).

request.description: Get aggregated cost summary for a trip. Returns summary with total_cost, fuel_cost, toll_cost, other_costs, cost_count, last_updated, and breakdown by cost type.

Get detailed trip costs grouped by category. Returns trip info, grand_total, total_entries, and categories array with each category containing: category name (operating/cargo/compliance/penalty/misc), total_amount, count, and all cost entries in that category.

Bulk create trip costs.

**Date/Time Format:** ISO 8601 (e.g., 2026-12-20T10:30:00Z)

**Note:** trip_id is taken from URL path and vehicle_id is taken from the trip record. Do NOT include trip_id or vehicle_id in the request body.

**Fields:**
- `cost_type`: Required (fuel, toll, driver_allowance, parking, loading_charges, unloading_charges, etc.)
- `amount`: Required, must be > 0
- `date`: Required, ISO 8601 format
- `time`: Optional, ISO 8601 format (time portion will be extracted as HH:MM)
- `notes`, `custom_cost_type_name`: Optional
- For fuel: `fuel_type`, `fuel_quantity`, `fuel_rate`, `km_per_liter` (Optional)

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Trip costs processed",
  "created_count": 2,
  "error_count": 0,
  "costs": [
    {
      "id": 101,
      "trip_id": 1,
      "vehicle_id": 1,
      "cost_type": "fuel",
      "amount": 5000.00,
      "date": "2026-12-20T10:30:00Z",
      "time": "10:30",
      "notes": "Diesel refill at HP Pump"
    }
  ]
}

response.name: Validation Error
Partial Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Some trip costs failed validation",
  "created_count": 1,
  "error_count": 1,
  "costs": [{"id": 102, "cost_type": "toll", "amount": 300.00}],
  "errors": ["Entry 2: date is required (ISO 8601 format)"]
}

item.name: Get Vehicle Trip Costs

query.description: Filter by cost type - single (fuel) or comma-separated (fuel,toll,parking). Invalid types are silently ignored.
Sort by: date, amount, cost_type, created_at

item.description:
Get all trip costs for a vehicle with pagination, filtering, and sorting.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page`: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- `cost_type`: Filter by cost type - supports single value or comma-separated list (e.g., `fuel,toll,parking`)
- `start_date`: Filter by start date (DD-MM-YYYY)
- `end_date`: Filter by end date (DD-MM-YYYY)
- `sort_by`: Sort field (date, amount, cost_type, created_at)
- `sort_order`: Sort direction (asc, desc)

**Multi Cost Type Filter Examples:**
- Single type: `cost_type=fuel`
- Multiple types: `cost_type=fuel,toll,parking`
- With date range: `cost_type=fuel,toll&start_date=01-01-2025&end_date=31-12-2025`

**Valid Cost Types:** fuel, toll, driver_allowance, parking, loading_charges, unloading_charges, insurance, permit, registration_renewal, fitness_check, emission_test, state_permit, national_permit, chalan, other

**Response includes:**
- `costs`: Array of trip cost records
- `total_cost`: Overall total for this vehicle
- `filtered_total`: Total for filtered results
- `cost_by_type`: Breakdown by cost type (filtered if cost_types applied)
- `count`, `page`, `per_page`, `total_pages`
- `has_more`: Boolean for infinite scroll
- `next_page`: Next page number (null if no more)
- `applied_filters`: Currently applied filters with `cost_types` as array

item.name: 09. Maintenance Costs
item.description:
Vehicle maintenance tracking (10 cost types).

**Date Format**: DD-MM-YYYY (e.g., 31-12-2025)
**Time Format**: HH:MM 24-hour (e.g., 14:30)

**Cost Types**: tyre, battery, oil_change, brake_service, engine_repair, clutch_repair, suspension, electrical, body_work, other

item.name: List All Maintenance Costs

query.description: Filter by cost type - single (tyre) or comma-separated (tyre,battery,oil_change)

item.description:
Get all maintenance costs for the organization.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page`: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- `vehicle_id`: Filter by specific vehicle
- `cost_type`: Filter by cost type - single value or comma-separated (e.g., `tyre,battery,oil_change`)
- `start_date`: Filter by start date (DD-MM-YYYY)
- `end_date`: Filter by end date (DD-MM-YYYY)

**Valid Cost Types:** tyre, battery, oil_change, brake_service, engine_repair, ac_service, body_work, cleaning, hydraulic_repair, other

item.name: Get Vehicle Maintenance Costs

query.description: Filter by cost type - single (tyre) or comma-separated (tyre,battery,oil_change). Invalid types are silently ignored.
Sort by: date, amount, cost_type, created_at

item.description:
Get all maintenance costs for a vehicle with pagination, filtering, and sorting.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page`: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- `cost_type`: Filter by cost type - supports single value or comma-separated list (e.g., `tyre,battery,oil_change`)
- `start_date`: Filter by start date (DD-MM-YYYY)
- `end_date`: Filter by end date (DD-MM-YYYY)
- `sort_by`: Sort field (date, amount, cost_type, created_at)
- `sort_order`: Sort direction (asc, desc)

**Multi Cost Type Filter Examples:**
- Single type: `cost_type=tyre`
- Multiple types: `cost_type=tyre,battery,oil_change`
- With date range: `cost_type=tyre,battery&start_date=01-01-2025&end_date=31-12-2025`

**Valid Cost Types:** tyre, battery, oil_change, brake_service, engine_repair, ac_service, body_work, cleaning, hydraulic_repair, other

**Response includes:**
- `costs`: Array of maintenance cost records
- `total_cost`: Overall total for this vehicle
- `filtered_total`: Total for filtered results
- `cost_by_type`: Breakdown by cost type (filtered if cost_types applied)
- `count`, `page`, `per_page`, `total_pages`
- `has_more`: Boolean for infinite scroll
- `next_page`: Next page number (null if no more)
- `applied_filters`: Currently applied filters with `cost_types` as array

request.description:
Bulk create maintenance costs.

**Date/Time Format:** ISO 8601 (e.g., 2026-12-20T10:00:00Z)

**Note:** vehicle_id is taken from URL path. Do NOT include vehicle_id in the request body.

**Fields:**
- `cost_type`: Required (tyre, battery, oil_change, brake_service, engine_repair, ac_service, body_work, cleaning, hydraulic_repair, other)
- `amount`: Required, must be > 0
- `date`: Required, ISO 8601 format
- `time`: Optional, ISO 8601 format (time portion will be extracted as HH:MM)
- `description`, `notes`, `vendor_name`, `invoice_no`: Optional

response.name: Validation Error
Partial Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Some maintenance costs failed validation",
  "created_count": 1,
  "error_count": 1,
  "costs": [{"id": 1, "cost_type": "oil_change", "amount": 5000.00}],
  "errors": ["Entry 2: date is required (ISO 8601 format)"]
}

item.name: 10. Dashboard
item.description:
Dashboard and analytics - Provides comprehensive fleet management statistics with role-based data.

**Section APIs for Mobile App:**
- Unified Dashboard: Complete dashboard data
- Cost Overview: Expenses with Today/Weekly/Monthly filter
- Pending Payments: Trips with pending payments
- Vehicle Status: Vehicle counts by state
- Trips Status: Trip counts by state with delayed detection
- Drivers Status: Driver availability counts
- Alerts Status: Alerts summary with expiry notifications

item.name: Unified Dashboard
item.description: Returns comprehensive dashboard with all sections. Response includes: user_info, fleet_overview, today_summary, alerts, quick_actions, live_status, team_stats (owner only), document_stats (owner/manager).

item.name: Owner Dashboard
item.description: Owner-specific dashboard with team management stats.

item.name: Manager Dashboard
item.description: Manager-specific dashboard with operational focus.

item.name: Supervisor Dashboard
item.description: Supervisor-specific dashboard with tracking focus.

item.name: Cost Overview - Today
item.description: Today's cost overview with total_expenses, total_profit_loss, completed_trips, total_revenue, fuel_cost, toll_cost, maintenance_cost, other_costs, profit_margin.

item.name: Pending Payments
item.description: Lists trips with pending payments. Response includes: trip_id, vehicle_registration, customer_name, selling_value, partial_payment, pending_amount, days_overdue, payment_status.

item.name: Vehicle Status
item.description: Vehicle counts by status. Response: on_trip_planned, on_trip_in_progress, under_maintenance, active, inactive, total.

item.name: Trips Status
item.description: Trip counts by status with delayed detection. Response: in_progress, planned, delayed, completed_today, completed_total, cancelled, total, recent_trips[].

item.name: Drivers Status
item.description: Driver availability counts. Response: on_trip_planned, on_trip_in_progress, available, on_leave, inactive, total.

item.name: Alerts Status
item.description: Alerts summary with counts by type/priority. Response: total_alerts, critical_alerts, warning_alerts, info_alerts, document_expiring, license_expiring, pending_payments, maintenance_vehicles, alerts[].

item.description: Profit/Loss reports and analytics
